metadata.title: CVE-2022-36648 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The hardware emulation in the of_dpa_cmd_add_l2_flood ofrocker device model in QEMU, as used in 7.0.0 and earlier, allows remoteattackers to crash the host qemu and potentially execute code on the hostvia execute a malformed program in the guest OS. Note: This has beendisputed by multiple third parties as not a valid vulnerability due to therocker device not falling within the virtualization use case.

criterions.comment: qemu package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-04-15').
